extras.about:
HMIS Registers

The following registers were modeled and incorporated into NHDD v1.1, based on the 2014 HMIS Data Recording and Reporting Guidelines:

  • Comprehensive Abortion Care Register
  • Antenatal Care Register
  • Labor and Delivery Register
  • Growth Monitoring Register
  • Infant Immunization and Growth Monitoring Register
  • Family Planning Register
  • Inpatient Admission / Discharge (IPD) Register
  • Outpatient (OPD) Register
  • Operation Register
  • Post-Exposure to HIV Prophylaxis (PEP) Follow Up Register
  • PMTCT Register
  • Postnatal Care (PNC) Register
  • Referral Register
  • Tetanus Toxoid Immunization Register
  • Voluntary Counseling and Testing Register
  • ART Register
  • Leprosy Register
  • MDR-TB Register
  • MDR-TB Follow up Register
  • Pre-ART register, Pre ART Register
  • Leprosy Register for Care after Completion of Treatment (RFT) Register
  • Unit TB Register
  • IMNCI Register

Please note that the full release of NHDD v1.1 is planned for the first quarter of 2017, ans some of the above content may not be available until that time.
